entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.title: windows10fan648/zapmgr: ZapMgr is a lightweight, experimental Node.js package manager built for Windows. It allows users to initialize a project, install local packages, and manage dependencies with a simple command-line interface. Inspired by package managers like npm and Yarn, ZapMgr aims to offer a hands-on approach to understanding package environment concepts
entry.content: ZapMgr is a lightweight, experimental Node.js package manager built for Windows. It allows users to initialize a project, install local packages, and manage dependencies with a simple command-line interface. Inspired by package managers like npm and Yarn, ZapMgr aims to offer a hands-on approach to understanding package environment concepts

entry.title: gautamgiri-dev/use-status-manager: A lightweight and flexible custom React hook for managing subscriptions and status updates in your application. It helps you subscribe to a list of candidates, fetch their statuses, and keep them updated with polling and debounce functionality.
